text: Sharad Arvind Bobde (born 24 April 1956) is an Indian judge. He was the 47th Chief Justice of India from 18 November 2019 to 23 April 2021. He is a former Chief Justice of Madhya Pradesh High Court. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of India Category:Marathi people
title: Sharad Arvind Bobde
